name: Guacamelee! One-Two Punch Collection
overview: The Guacamelee! One-Two Punch Collection collects the critically acclaimed Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition and its highly anticipated sequel, Guacamelee! 2, into one incredible must-buy package. The Guacamelee! series combines action-packed 2D brawling with challenging platforming and Metroidvania progression elements. Inspired by Mexican folklore, Guacamelee! has players take control of a down-on-his-luck wrestler named Juan Aguacate as he explores a huge hand-crafted world filled with hordes of undead enemies and sassy bosses... and who said anything about a Chicken Illuminati? Certainly not us!
